questions.question: According to Bhagavad-gita, only the ____ speak of devotional service as being different from the analytical study of the material world.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.4 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Only the ignorant speak of devotional service [karma-yoga] as being different from the analytical study of the material world [Sāṅkhya].'

questions.question: The Personality of Godhead replied that ____ in devotional service is better than renunciation of work.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.2 (translation) | QUOTE: 'The Personality of Godhead replied: The renunciation of work and work in devotion are both good for liberation. But, of the two, work in devotional service is better than renunciation of work.'

questions.question: An intelligent person does not take part in the sources of ____ due to contact with the material senses.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.22 (translation) | QUOTE: 'An intelligent person does not take part in the sources of misery, which are due to contact with the material senses.'

questions.question: Those whose minds are established in ____ and equanimity have already conquered the conditions of birth and death.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.19 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Those whose minds are established in sameness and equanimity have already conquered the conditions of birth and death.'

questions.question: One who neither hates nor desires the fruits of his activities is known to be always ____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.3 (translation) | QUOTE: 'One who neither hates nor desires the fruits of his activities is known to be always renounced.'

questions.question: According to Bhagavad-gita, the results of both paths can be achieved by one who applies himself well to one of ____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.4 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Those who are actually learned say that he who applies himself well to one of these paths achieves the results of both.'

questions.question: The Personality of Godhead replied that ____ and work in devotion are both good for liberation.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.2 (translation) | QUOTE: 'The Personality of Godhead replied: The renunciation of work and work in devotion are both good for liberation.'

questions.question: Such pleasures have a ____ and an end, and so the wise man does not delight in them.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.22 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Such pleasures have a beginning and an end, and so the wise man does not delight in them.'

questions.question: Those who are already situated in ____ are flawless like Brahman.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.19 (translation) | QUOTE: 'They are flawless like Brahman, and thus they are already situated in Brahman.'

questions.question: One who is free from all ____ easily overcomes material bondage and is completely liberated.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.3 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Such a person, free from all dualities, easily overcomes material bondage and is completely liberated.'

meta.query: provide answer from chapter 5 in bg
meta.refined_query:
